messages.messagePreview: Hey! I heard about Servant's Day and would love to contribute...

conversation.text: Hey! I heard about Servant’s Day and I would love to contribute. Do you have any open projects?
We desperately need people to paint Bradfield Hall’s lobby if you’re interested.
That sounds great! I have lots of experience painting so I think I could be a good fit. What’s the next step?

messages.messagePreview: Hello! My name is Clara and I was wondering if there might...

conversation.text: Hello! My name is Clara and I was wondering if there might be an opening for volunteers?
Sure! We’re always looking for volunteers to help around the church.

messages.messagePreview: We have an opening for a 5th grade teacher. We saw you had...

conversation.text: We have an opening for a 5th grade teacher. We saw you had experience with teaching children. Would you be interested?
Thank you for reaching out! I’m interested. Can you provide more details about the position?

messages.messagePreview: We wanted to take a moment to thank you for your incredible...

conversation.text: We wanted to take a moment to thank you for your incredible work in the community. Your support means a lot to us!
You're very welcome! I’m always happy to help out. I appreciate the recognition.
